title: Bitcoin breaks $45K milestone, focus turns to pending US ETF approvals
description: Bitcoin, the world’s leading cryptocurrency, has reached a significant milestone by surpassing the $45,000 price level for the first time in nearly two years.  This surge in Bitcoin’s price comes as the crypto market eagerly awaits the potential approval of the first spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) in the United States. Bitcoin’s remarkable rise In […]
